help-file.title: "SONG OF DECAY"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: N/A Duration: Instantaneous/Depends Type of song: Generic/Enchantment
"Song of Decay" removes some lifeforce from those in the room not grouped with the piper, the amount dependent on both level and skill. This song has also been known to cause other affects, such as blindness and poison, and it is not possible to kill using this song.
